website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around toaster at a decent price point.
pros: Can toast 4 slices at once, or 2 full bagels
Includes 7 settings for the shade of your toast
Includes a reheat function if you wait too long to get to your bread after it toasts
The toast gets browned evenly on both sides
cons: This product doesn't seem to have the longevity of some of the other toasters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great quality toaster, exceeding expectation! Love the four slots, great for a family of six. Also spacious enough to accommodate waffles and bagels with no problems. Love the function to defrost frozen bagels. Cute color with retro design made it a lovely decoration to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Bing Yang

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I seen some reviews complaining about the plastic smell. I just ran the toaster 2 to 4 times and the smell went away before I actually used it. Great buy. I’d buy again. The setting are great. No burnt toast. Love the color. Matched my kitchen aide mixer.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect toaster looks wise for me. The only teensy weensy issue is all toast sticks to the toasters sides and the bread, english muffin or bagel actually does NOT pop up. I use 4 as my setting. I always use frozen bread after I have thawed it in the microwave. Maybe I need to use it frozen. I will update this review with my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Liz H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster we have ever had. It toast evenly on both sided. It has wide slots for wider bread and rolls. It looks great and does the job. It is priced right. I would buy another one if we needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Toasted EVENLY on both sides.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is GREAT. I was so tired of burnt toast on one side and untoasted on the other. I started looking online for a replacement. I found this one and read the reviews. After looking at so many different toasters This one was in my price range and had all of the features I wanted - so I ordered it. IT ARRIVED THE NEXT DAY. When I saw the first batch of toast, I was a happy person. The toast was perfectly browned on BOTH sides and the brownness was perfect. I love doing business with this company And I love my toaster.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swagert

customer_reviews.title: Four slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! I didn't give it stars for durability because I've only had it for a couple months and so far so good! It works well! The price is good and I would recommend it. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: lampgail

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, fun pop of color!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toaster. The pop of color is exactly what I wanted in my kitchen, and it works really well on top of that.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!  Steer clear!
customer_reviews.text: Toaster was fine for a few weeks, then suddenly began toasting only one side of bread. Called Mfr and Seller, but no response. Amazon conceded it was a dead end since they were in China and offered a partial refund less a 'restocking charge' that I have to eat on a $60 toaster that lasted 5 weeks. Just say no!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent toasting
customer_reviews.text: I wish I liked this toaster. I love the way it looks and how you can have two different things cooking and on different settings. I like the wife slots. However, I hate this toaster. The temperature settings are so beyond off. I’ll cook a waffle and I have to run it through twice, the next time, on the same setting, it comes out burnt. I literally never know what my stuff will look like when it comes out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one side works 1 month into use. Updated
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this toaster but unfortunately it stopped working right after the return window closed. Only one side works at a time, totally defeating the point of having a 4 slice toaster. Update: after posting my review the company’s customer service contacted me and immediately sent me a replacement toaster. So far it is working well. It is only a few days in, but I hope it continues working because I absolutely love the design . Hopefully I just got a glitchy one the first time .
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Cottone

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: What I liked was the appearance. Everything thing else about it is junk. One side stopped working within 90 days. Really poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: steve o

customer_reviews.title: This thing doesn't have a cancel button so you better not need to pop the toast up early!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this thing 0 stars if I could. It doesn't have a cancel button and it takes iron man to get the toast to pop up early. Definitely not kid friendly. What if they turn it to 6 and it starts burning? Chinese named piece of junk. Go with the real name brand - it does have a cancel button.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A Zeien

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return
customer_reviews.text: Two days over return expiration date toaster not working properly. Would like to have it replaced. Can send pics of toast or rather bread up toasted if you like. SusN and John Garrett Yesterday replacement toaster arrived. Thanks so much ! Susan Garrett
customer_reviews.author: John Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The toaster had 2 large dents on one end where the clam shell packaging protected it. Both the inner box, outer box and all packaging were totally undamaged, which tells me it left the factory dented. Also, the numbers on the toasting selection were way too small to be easily readable. I returned the toaster for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: shaoning weng
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t thought of it for a few days before I started to comment. I have toasted the children in the morning, sandwiched the eggs, and served with the milk. The children like it very much. This operation is very simple, convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: shaoning weng

customer_reviews.title: Burns the bread
customer_reviews.text: A very nice looking toaster, BUT...it doesn't work properly...no matter what setting I choose for toast darkness, it burns the bread...totally black!! It's because of this default, I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and toasts well and evenly, but otherwise a poor design. The inside of the slot openings have a hard edge that the bread keeps getting hung on. I have to use my finger or a utensil to push the bread away from the edges so that the toast pops up all the way. Very frustrating. Also, the toasting levels on the adjustment dials are difficult to see. They are black numbers on a shiny chrome dial. Because the dials are so reflective, it causes the numbers to blend into the reflection, making the numbers difficult to see. I often need a flashlight to make them out. Disappointed overall so I'm getting rid of it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MH304

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Not all the coils light up, so you end up with a partially soggy waffle or a partially burnt bagel. Not worth it. Defective.
customer_reviews.author: HESS_NC

customer_reviews.title: Premium price for a generic item
customer_reviews.text: The "Cusinaid" brand does not exist, right? You can't just mash-up Cuisinart and Kitchen-Aid and put this title on a completely generic product, right? I ordered this based on reviews and all that good stuff, but as soon as it arrived and I unboxed the toaster, I discovered a completely no-name generic product with a disconcerting spring-rattle as soon as you pick it up. Plain brown box, no brand (certainly not "Cuisinaid") on the packaging, insert, or item. No. At this price point, I'll buy one of the actual brands that this is attempting to invoke. So this is a one-star based on deceptive product promotion; I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: OH_consumer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your sliced bread fits
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks nice on the kitchen counter but I am not overly impressed. The tops of some ordinary brand-named slices of bread do not fully fit into the toaster when the lever is fully depressed. The top 1/4 to 1/2 inch may not get toasted. This is the first toaster in my life I have ever had this be an issue. I also have found I have to set the level of toasting about 2 levels higher than the provided color chart shows I should to match the same browness of toast. Not a big deal I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has a lot of features, it includes bagel, defrost, reheat and cancel buttons for great versatility. You can also choose how light or dark you want your toast to come out. I choose baby blue color because it matches with my other appliances. I really like the fact there is a cord winder on it to keep the excess cord off the counter and while it's pretty lightweight it seems very sturdy. The appearance on the counter is nice too since it's all chrome and black.
customer_reviews.author: Emil F.

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster that is so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. It replaced and old Proctor-Silex that was worn out. This toaster has lots of settings, and a guide to help you get your toast exactly the way you like it. We love how retro it looks--it's so cute! We bought the blue one and it's a light aqua blue. The cord is long and the toasting features are nice. The slots are wide enough for toaster pastries, all kinds of bread and bagels. It even has a "defrost" function! I was a little concerned about paying over $50 for a toaster, but this little guy is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Enke Wilson

customer_reviews.title: As the old adage goes “You get what you pay for”.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first but have since decided that the temperature dials aren’t very accurate. Toasting on level 3.2 is almost burnt toast and it doesn’t matter what temp you have it set on because it only toasts the top and the middle of the bread. And I didn’t notice that it didn’t have slots large enough for bagels. I wish I would have continued looking for a digital taster with size appropriate slots.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Most impressed with the toaster
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong here. Came with nice instructions that showed how the settings alter the look of your toast. You can make two different things on different settings at the same time. My favorite aspect is that the toaster doesn't stay hot forever after toasting something. You can literally put it away 5 minutes later. My old toaster ended up sitting on the counter for at least 30 minutes as I thought it would start a fire in the cabinet. It No worries here. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for not only a nice toaster but something that would stand out in the kitchen for a little color pop. This was great, love not only the look but it does the job! Has the cool retro feel to it and all the things needed for perfect toast! Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Retro Looking..
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new toaster, and I wanted a blue four slicer, so this was the one. It toasts really well, and the color is purdy :) Just FYI - if you want super toasty with burnt crisp, you select #4. If you want toasty/soft ish, you want #3.
customer_reviews.author: range

customer_reviews.title: what color?
customer_reviews.text: the item arrived on time and was packaged very well. and works great for what it is. the product does what is is meant to do. I don't know about anyone else but in the picture of the toaster it looks like a baby blue color and that is one of the reason's why I wanted it. but once I opened it, it is more like a teal blue color which to me is a pretty color as well. it was just not what I was expecting. but all in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: missylyn1990

customer_reviews.title: Turns your bread into toast!
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing... I put in bread and it magically turns to toast with a press of the button!! Actually a nice 4 slice toaster, works well, wide slots and has a defrost mode. No problems with it so far. Toasts bread evenly
customer_reviews.author: Icyunz

customer_reviews.title: Retro charm
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is cute and works great. I love the retro design and the bright teal color. The temperature controls are wonderful. I get nicely toasted bread every time. The unit is easy to clean as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Mewsagi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is so beautiful! It’s easy to use. Works great on toast and frozen waffles. I keep mine on 2 1/2. On 3 toast gets too dark. 2.5 is perfect. Wipe it down with silver cleaner spray looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the retro look of this toaster. Many reviews said it toasts unevenly, and it does, but not enough for me to send it back, but enough to give it 4 stars. It does toast nicely. If I am picky, I turn the toast around and do another cycle. The numbers on the temperature knobs are difficult to read if there isn't bright light, so I turn the light on. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and toasts evenly
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is so awesome - it has 4 wide slots so I can easily toast my bagels too. This makes breakfast so much easier so we can make breakfast sandwiches for both of us at the same time. It even has a defrost option so I can toast the bread from frozen! It toasts evenly and you can choose how dark you want it. Bonus - the stainless steel looks so nice on my countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mel

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading so many good reviews. It looks great sitting in my counter. However, it toasts incredibly uneven. One side will e dark brown and the other barely toasted. It does this in all 4 compartments. It’s too late for me to return it or I would be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Arlo Foster, Noel Woods + Family

customer_reviews.title: Would NEVER recommend. Hazzard, too hot to touch.
customer_reviews.text: I tested the unit as stated in instructions and there was no way we were keeping this product. The outside was so hot it literally burned my fingers. It would have melted anything that touched it or hurt a child as severely. Would NEVER recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toast
customer_reviews.text: Each and every time, perfect toast......only 1 issue....tray crumbs can only be taken out from back of toaster which is annoying if your toaster is plugged into wall outlet behind. I can live with that because all else is great toaster and the blue is so pretty.....soft blue and it gives you same toast on each level! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: IrishRose

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is junk. Out of the box some of the heating elements inside do not heat up. And the ones that do heat up do so at very different speeds turning red on the outside then only turning red on the inside fully after about 30 seconds. There is no possible way this toaster could provide even heating. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you live alone, buy a 4 slice toaster. No one wants to wait for your heathen pop tarts to heat up. We'd rather make our cinnamon sugar toast an get on with our lives. If you start dating someone an that loser only has a 2 slice toaster, move on. They are selfish narcissist who probably only butter their own toast.
customer_reviews.author: Bezos Tesla Payment

customer_reviews.title: 5 Weeks after delivery only one side works
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful toaster that worked great for the first 5 weeks. It now only toasts on one side. Disappointed in the quality. Update: Customer Service contacted me to replace the original toaster with one that was not defective. Very happy with the service received. Good company to stand behind product.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma bear

customer_reviews.title: adjustable browning as perfect at possible
customer_reviews.text: It replaces a red two slice toaster. i wanted to be able to do four slices at the same time. this is like having two toasters for the price of one. The browning controls are easy and I find between 2 and 3 to suit my taste perfectly. This toaster was packed so well with heavy recyclable cardboard I was amazed with the care and thought given. thank you
customer_reviews.author: ozzie t.

customer_reviews.title: excellent toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this toaster...especially bc it has 4 slots and i share my toast in the morning with my dogs:) when i had a 2 slotted toaster i wanted to eat both pieces myself and the dogs were always begging me for some:( the temp controls are very easy to use and are accurate and it is easy to clean too!!
customer_reviews.author: peggy buckley

customer_reviews.title: The color doesn’t stay true. Heat has made it fade.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this toaster is mediocre. Not horrible. Not great. My biggest gripe? I ordered a toaster that was the color shown in the sale picture... And that’s how it arrived. But after a month of use, I now own a baby blue toaster. The color has changed to that of a nursery toaster for a bouncing baby boy. Very disappointed. But alas, baby blue it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dustie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 slot toaster
customer_reviews.text: We had a toaster that we received as a wedding gift... it was starting to die and my wife wanted a new one... this one has some great features.. you can defrost, toast well and do that consistently... looks good and is simple to clean..
customer_reviews.author: DCLW

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster
customer_reviews.text: It’s a toaster - it works - temp control is touchy on different items I leave it on 3 , put it on any higher and you’ll burn toast
customer_reviews.author: Justin Clark

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This review may be a little premature, but I’m still confident enough to write one. Based off other reviews, this was the best toaster I could find that had great reviews and would meet my criteria, which was basically color and design. I don’t need 4 slots, but they come in handy. From the few times I’ve used it, I’ve been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and the settings are great.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is that the slots claimed to be extra wide in the description and a slice of rye bread didn’t entirely fit.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: This is a great functioning and good looking toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this toaster. It has great adjustments on it that make the perfect toast every time. I appreciate the instructions. They are well written. Also, it looks clean and shiney all the time since it cleans up so easily.
customer_reviews.author: K & P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toast
customer_reviews.text: It was way past time for a new toaster, and this one is so much better than our old one. We've made toast on several of the settings, and they all matched the pictures on the enclosed toasting guide. The toaster looks great, and we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Funari

customer_reviews.title: Very cute color and will toast your bread,  bagels eta
customer_reviews.text: Very cute with my mocha colored kitchen. Love it. Lightweight. Wish it had a little oven. The blue color is cute. Make sure you put correct temperature on for your toast and test it out the selection that works for you and share it with your family’s
customer_reviews.author: El Fin

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love my new toaster! After dealing with a finicky toaster for the last few months my husband surprised me with this new one and I love it. It toasts evenly and on a low setting. 2 seems to be the perfect number.
customer_reviews.author: Summer R

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, heavy duty, bagel friendly
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a red toaster and chose this one. It has a wide range of temperatures, so still getting it adjusted to my needs. I bake bread and eat toast - so this is essential. I have enjoyed it greatly and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Functions Well  and Stylish Too!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new four slice toaster and wanted it to match our new kitchen. The dark red color on the body toaster is not overpowering and is very sleek. The toaster came with a card that shows what each number setting will output on your toast and it's pretty accurate. The toaster makes toast perfectly and we especially appreciate the wider slots so we can toast bagels. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: lissa0780

customer_reviews.title: The perfect toaster for me
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the cheap normal toaster which always breaks in the end. The problem is, with those toasters, you forget how good it is to have a good toaster that gives you an evenly toasted slice of bread. This toaster gives me the ability to control the degree of toasting with choices of medium, light, or dark. Also, when the bread pops up, it’s high enough to where you can grab it easily. Another thing I love about this toaster is the design! It looks retro yet sleek, which is the style that I am going for in my kitchen, making it the perfect toaster for me!
customer_reviews.author: Basma salem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is wonderful. It has wide bread/bagel slots and controls that has various stages of toasting with picture guide. It will defrost and then move immediately to the toasting action. This appliance is well worth your acquisition. So add to the enjoyment of your weekend mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A. Linares.

customer_reviews.title: Fits bagels just fine
customer_reviews.text: It fits everything bagels well. The slots are wide. It is a light blue color and NOT turquoise or Tiffany’s blue. You access the crumbs trays behind the device.
customer_reviews.author: P.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great 4-slice toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster!!! Toasts everything just right when you set the setting correctly. Looks sharpe on countertop. Very sleek and love ❤️ the red and stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Saunders

customer_reviews.title: 4 Slice Toaster (red)
customer_reviews.text: This 4 slice toaster was great. It browns evenly. It defrost and the size is just perfect for thicker slices of bread especially my bagels. It was a true red. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the kind of retro look. Mainly I like the features. It toasts my freezer waffles just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and plenty of temperature control but ours is already not working properly. We've had it a few months and cook alot of toast, its not cooking the toast to the correct level anymore and we have to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Administration of Justice Student

customer_reviews.title: excellent price for quailty
customer_reviews.text: So far it lives up to the advertising, I waited to write a review ,to make sure it works well. Also it looks very nice out on the counter, no reason to put it away nice addition to the kitchen. recommended and I don't say that very often.
customer_reviews.author: Al Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Using this in an RV but I need to buy another one for my house!! Love the cancel function and extra wide slots for like bagels. LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Chris E

customer_reviews.title: One side works sometimes after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this toaster. The fact that you can defrost a frozen piece of bread is amazing. It's been about 8 months and the right side of the toaster doesn't work all the time. You put your slice of bread in and it won't go down to toast. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year!
customer_reviews.text: Toaster broke in less than a year. Both sides will not hold bread down and turn on for more than 1-2 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Haggard Family

customer_reviews.title: Works great & looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding a red toaster that had the 4 slices, but I'm so glad I found this one. It works great and it also looks awesome in my kitchen with all my other red appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely would recommend. I gave it to my mom as a birthday gift. It included pictures of toast, at each of the different settings to show what the product will be. The speed is moderate, not exceptionally fast or slower than others. Quality is great, came prettier than the pictures showed. The blue is vibrant and looks great in a rustic kitchen. The four slots enables obviously up to 4 pieces made at once, very useful and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey T.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Controls for toast level are accurate and my wife, more importantly loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anxiety

customer_reviews.title: Great look and layout
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster! It has a great classic look, with a modern feel and good button layout.. It has dual temp control, but on top of this it has setting for those frozen waffles, or if you just need to rewarm your toast.
customer_reviews.author: Netgurney

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to get to the toast level I want with the dial knob, and if I changed my mind, I can just push the top button to release my toast. Plus, the toaster looks stylish and easy to maintain too.
customer_reviews.author: SlimQueen

customer_reviews.title: Product lasted 2 months then left toaster burners stopped heating.
customer_reviews.text: Things were well when first operated, then left side of toaster heating elements stopped working, will try to return and get different product.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean. Shines up well and looks nice in my blue kitchen. I like the popup release button. I seem to use it a lot when running late for an appointment and grabbing a quick breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Otsie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice 4-slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Color was perfect. Browning choices actually match the claims. A little slow but just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Johnson

customer_reviews.title: temp. control
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to worry about the color of the toast. the dials are perfect on what color you would like your toast to be and then it POPS UP to perfection! this is probably the best toaster we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Duane R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the reheat option, daily setting makes it easy to get the exact toast color you want, the red matches my kitchen decor, and I can cook 4 pieces at different toasty colors.
customer_reviews.author: Garlands

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 70 year old grandmother. She had no problems figuring out how to use all of the buttons and settings, and described it as "the Cadillac of toasters." She loves it, and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Etan Nogard

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4 stars because i purchased this as a gift, packaging was great but the toaster was dented up, pretty bad in 2 areas.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne chipman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design and Perfect Toast!
customer_reviews.text: This 4 slot toaster is very convenient for me and my family. We used to own just a regular 2 slot toaster and it takes a lot of time to get enough bread for the whole family toasted. Now we can do it twice as fast. Works very powerfully. Also has two trays that you can just take out and clean. Makes cleaning this thing a lot easier. Overall, this is just a very convenient and beautiful toaster that me and my family loved very much!
customer_reviews.author: Oimo Lam

customer_reviews.title: cute toaster
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and the different levels of toasting. However it is very new and already has spots on the metal hard to clean. I have a feeling it wont look great within a year
customer_reviews.author: Tray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking to match my kitchen. It has a lot cool features that just keeps my family happy.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Toast comes our perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new toaster! The color is great and compliments my new kitchen remodel perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for color and versatility. I love the dual controls so I don't burn my toast after someone else turns it up. It's beautiful in newly decorated kitchen, and cleans easily. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gay

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Cord comes out the front of toaster making it awkward to plug in it’s a bad design factor.plus it should of been retractable cord
customer_reviews.author: JERSEY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, heavy-duty.
customer_reviews.text: Use this product nearly every day to either do regular toast or English muffins and it toasts very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Has a retro feel. Caribbean blue color matches backsplash beutifully. But, need to set on only 2 otherwise it burns. Love the reheat and defrost buttons. Only wish they were labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Sarnovsky

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the toaster but the slots are very shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is the best! It toasts perfectly. Comes with a chart showing how each level on the dial should toast and it is true to form. Love the color. It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: S. allen

customer_reviews.title: Longer slices of bread do not fit. They need to be cut
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the size of each opening. To small. Not happy with the temperature control. It looks pretty and it is easy to keep clean but not enough to ever recommend this product. Rita. Niantic CT.
customer_reviews.author: rita franco palazzo

customer_reviews.title: Left bank don't stay down
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, toasts great.... But the left left side doesn't stay down.... Any way to fix this?
customer_reviews.author: Alexander N.

customer_reviews.title: Toasts well and darkness is adjustable (I assume using a potentiamrter disl. )
customer_reviews.text: Heat up stink was awful until it burned out. After that item worked bery well. Degree of toasting adjustments work well. Toast lift is quite minimal. Very pretty. Works well over all.
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this toaster!!! Cute AND works amazingly!! I would completely recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS!!! GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE MY NEW TOASTER... I have done waffles and toast so far.. PERFECT and VERY BEAUTIFULLY MADE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good toaster.what I find problematic, difficult to read temperature control dial.
customer_reviews.author: John Caporicci

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The cord Is in the front, which is strange, but long enough to pull it to the back and plug in. Good quality, easy to use, nice toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Maria simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this toaster! I use setting #3 for my toast, and it comes out PERFECTLY every time. Can’t wait to try it with bagels
customer_reviews.author: Remybuxaplenty

customer_reviews.title: Retro type toaster with defrost feature
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and functional and has a real retro vibe.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fairman

customer_reviews.title: Good Value in a 4-slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this toaster. Makes consistent toast. I put it on the counter to use, then put away in closet. I like that the cord comes out the front, where we can use it on an under-counter plug outlet.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best 4 slice toaster I've had and it matches my kitchen perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Brock Leno

customer_reviews.title: style, quality, and easy to use 👌
customer_reviews.text: awesome for my kitchen! Nice quality for the price, wife loves this toaster great for bagels 🥯 or toast .
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Wingrove

customer_reviews.title: check the crumbs tray before using
customer_reviews.text: Went to clean the crumb tray on the left side and found there was not one. Called amazon but got no answer. Called the brand cusinaid, no results. Does not toast evenly. nt to clean the crumb tray on the left side and found there was not any. Got no results when calling Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA ZORAN

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: What do you say about a toaster? It does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son-in-law and daughter for Christmas and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster, works very well and I love the red!
customer_reviews.author: Benj

product_meta.title: Toaster 4 Slice, CUSINAID 4 Wide Slots Stainless Steel Toasters with Reheat Defrost Cancel Function, 7-Shade Setting, Red
feature_bullets: Efficient 4-Slice Toaster: 4 Extra wide slots (1.5”width) extend heating surface allows for a wide variety of items to be toasted. With Dual independent control panels, saving time for your busy morning
7 Shade Control and Evenly Toasting: 7-Level adjustable brown settings from light to dark to meet everyone's taste, 1400W high power will toast on both sides evenly and get hot fast

Optional Smart Function: 3 Easy touch buttons allow you to REHEAT, FROST and CANCEL, extremely meet all your daily toast needs. LED indicators let you specify exactly how you want to toasting for bread
Easy Use and No Mess: Automatic Pop Up High-lift Lever makes it easier to reach small slices, 2 removable crumb trays make cleaning quickly and cord wrap storage makes no mess
Safe to Use: FDA approval, 18/8 stainless steel 4 slices toaster with ETL certificated. A great gift for housewarming, Christmas, birthday, wedding, etc.
